node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari does not bother meeting your gaze.*}}
We have nothing more to say to each other, lack-salt.
node.choice: I have make good use of your gift. Is there any way to get another one?
Issachari using weapon bearing your mark attacked me in the salt dunes. I believe you owe me an explanation.
As you say. Live and drink.
Just one more thing, if you please.
Live and drink – and walk in the shade, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari grins, focused on cleaning her weapon.*}}
I owe you nothing, lack-salt. And I trust you will not disturb the Stiltgrounds, so pick a direction and walk.
node.choice: I will not. I have more of your speechwater to waste.
You trust your life on a risky wager, huntress. Live and drink – for now.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari takes her eyes off her weapon.*}}
Have you come bearing news of the Saltback Graveyard, lack-salt?

choice.IfFinishedQuestStep: Combing the Salt Dunes~Locate the Saltback Graveyard

node.choice: About the Saltback Graveyard...
Remind me why you want to find this place again?
Why is it I'm the one looking for this place why you smoke the hookah here?
No. But is this the rifle you use to take down saltbacks?
Not yet, but I will. Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari squints at you.*}}
You're standing in my shade, lack-salt.
node.choice: That's a nice rifle you've got.
What makes it your shade?
What are you even doing here?
I'm not a lack-salt; I have some right there.
I'm in need of work. Do you have any that needs doing?
Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari lays her weapon accross her knees.*}}
And what do you know of our rifling traditions, lack-salt?
node.choice: I know a thing or two about rifles, and this one's pretty unusual.
Not much, but it's still an impressive weapon nonetheless.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari grips her weapon tighter.*}}
Nothing worth wasting speechwater over. State your purpose, lack-salt.
node.choice: I was about to.
Sorry for bothering you. Live and drink, grumpy huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari relaxes somewhat.*}}
At least you prove honest, lack-salt. This is my own creation, fit for hunting Moghra'yi giants.
node.choice: Thank you for enlightening me. I had other questions.
Very impressive. Live and drink, gunsmith huntress.

node.text: The early dawnglider gets the worm. Make greater haste across Moghra'yi next time, lack-salt, and you may just secure yourself some shade.
node.choice: I will. If you allow it, huntress, I have other questions.
I see. Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari pulls her veil higher on her face as to preserve moisture.*}}
Wasting speechwater.
node.choice: I must insist, please. I do not often cross the path of talkative Issachari.
I'll help you save some, then. Live and drink.

node.text: And for good reason. But I'll entertain your question: I have come to trade the spoils of hunting.
node.choice: Makes sense. If I can waste some more speechwater, I had other questions.
I will not bother you then. Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari's smile reaches above her veil.*}}
Do you now? Salt isn't enough to make you *not* a lack-salt, lack-salt.
node.choice: It sort of is, though. Hence the name.
Isn't it? What would be enough then?

node.text:
Whatever you say, lack-salt.
{{emote|*The Issachari settles more comfortably, unbothered.*}}
node.choice: Since there is no changing your opinion, I have other questions.
I tire of this. Live and drink.
I will. If you allow it, I have other questions.
I see. Live and drink, ensaltened huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari's brow furrows as she considers your words.*}}
It all depends on you, lack-salt. Do you cower from the sun? Is pacing Moghra'yi too much to bear?
node.choice: No to both of those: I am a seasoned traveler.
I nearly ran out of water already, no way I'm heading there again.
Why do you even want to find this place?
I need some time to consider this. In the meantime, could we talk about something else?
Find the Saltback Graveyard, got it. Simple enough; live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari rolls her eyes under salt-flaked brows.*}}
Think for a second, lack-salt: scutes and bones worth ten times their weight in water, left there for the taking. Not like the deads have any use for it. Find the place – if it exists – and I'll make sure to reward you handsomely. What say you?
node.choice: I will think this over, but I have other questions for you.
Find the Saltback Graveyard, got it. Simple enough – live and drink, huntress.
I will not help you rob the dead – live and drink, for now.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari shuts her eyes for a moment, gathering patience.*}}
Scutes. Bones. For the taking. Write it down if you must, lack-salt, but stop wasting my speechwater over this.
node.choice: I will not forget it this time, I promise. Just another question before I go.
Thank you for the reminder, but I should get going. Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
No one's forcing you, lack-salt. Pick a direction and walk, for all I care.
{{emote|*The Issachari redirects her attention to her rifle.*}}
node.choice: This does not sound safe. I have a few other questions for you.
I will do just that. Live and drink, huntress.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari carefully chooses her next words.*}}
Among other things, lack-salt. Why do you ask?
node.choice: I was wondering what it would take to get one of those.
Sheer curiosity. Live and drink, sharpshooter.

node.text:
{{emote|*A smile spreads on the Issachari's wind-carved face.*}}
Tell you what, lack-salt: you find the Saltback Graveyard and I'll gift you one of my hunting weapons.
node.choice: I will hold you to that. I had another question, if you don't mind.
Motivation enough – I will return with the Graveyard's location. In the meantime, live and drink.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari leans forward, her intense gaze on you.*}}
... Yes?
node.choice: I may have found it.
{{R|*lie*}} I have looked far and wide, huntress: the Saltback Graveyard is a myth.
Give up your search, huntress. The Saltback Graveyard is under my protection.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari's eyes go wide, and her veil nearly slips from her face.*}}
Have you? Where is it?
node.choice: Nestled between wind-carved dunes. {{W|*show her the exact location on your map*}}
On second thought, I may be mistaken...

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari nods enthusiastically, already planning her next move.*}}
Yes, yes, that's perfect! As promised, lack-salt, here is your payment. Make good use of it.
node.choice: Thank you for this, huntress. Live and drink.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari sits back, visibly disappointed.*}}
Just because you didn't find it does not mean it isn't there, lack-salt. Moghra'yi has a way of hiding secrets from unsavvy eyes.
node.choice: I have spent weeks combing the salt dunes. Disrespect me if you wish, huntress, but do not doubt me.
I should look closer then...

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari considers you for a moment before speaking up again.*}}
Perhaps you are telling the truth, and it is just another myth. So be it then! I have wasted enough speechwater on hunting folk tales – let my next target be flesh and blood. Go now, lack-salt.
node.choice: Be seeing you. Live and drink.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari tenses up.*}}
Choose your next words very carefully, lack-salt.
node.choice: The only caution to be had is yours, Issachari. I warn you: profane the saltbacks' resting grounds and let your blood soak the salt dunes.
Protection? What protection? I misspoke.

node.text:
{{emote|*The Issachari's words are laced with venom.*}}
So be it, then. In your idiocy you confirm the place's very existence, lack-salt. Keep your eyes on your back when crossing the desert: the red-and-white is everywhere.
node.choice: As your people say: stay warm and stay dry.

node.text: This is the start of the conversation.
node.choice: What's up?
Do you like protecting tortoises?
Live and drink.

node.text: Hey you know what here is the graveyard location.
node.choice: I've more to ask.
Live and drink, priest.

node.text: Honestly yeah.
node.choice: Are you sure?
I've more to ask.
Live and drink.

node.text: Pretty sure yeah.
node.choice: I've more to ask.
Live and drink.

node.text: {{emote|*Ortolo settles on the ground.*}}~ {{emote|*Ortolo snaps at dust particles.*}}~ {{emote|*Cold mist leaks from Ortolo's shell.*}}~ {{emote|*Ortolo sneezes snowflakes.*}}~ {{emote|*Ortolo retracts into =pronouns.possessive= shell.*}}~
node.choice: Live and drink, frosty hatchling.

node.text: {{emote|*keeps walking silently.*}}

choice.text: O great giant, I am a friend to shellbeareres everywhere. What is your destination?

node.choice: Live and drink, wandering giant.

node.text: {{emote|*The gigantic elderly saltback presses foreheads with you, and clarity strikes your mind: one last pilgrimage to a final resting place.*}}

choice.text: I see. Live and drink until then, pilgrim.
